# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Botanist
The Botanist is responsible for growing food and herbs for the crew. They can achieve this by using the hydroponics trays and seed dispensers. Expert botanists can experiment with unstable mutagen to produce larger yields or even brand new species. The Botanist is invaluable to the Kitchen and Chemistry.
## Do - Grow plenty of food. - Produce useful medicinal herbs. - Experiment with mutagen to produce larger yields or even brand new species. - Wage an unending war against the mice, cockroaches and snails.
## Don't - Prioritise unnecessary produce over food and medicine; such as marijuana and more dubious plants. So long as there's food, then you're free to grow whatever you want.
